titleStmt.title: An ansvver to the calumnious letter and erroneous propositions of an apostat named M. Io. Hammiltoun. Composed by M. VVilliam Fouler
titleStmt.author: Fowler, William, 1560?-1612.

publicationStmt.publisher: Be Robert Lekprewick dwelling at the Netherbow,

notesStmt.note: Prints one paragraph of the Hamilton letter, which does not otherwise survive; the 15 propositions included here are printed with 9 more in STC 12729--Cf. STC.
Running title reads: The confutatioun of his erroneous propositiouns.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
